title: Get ready for the Pokémon Day Virtual Concert with Post Malone!
author: The Official Pokémon YouTube channel
description:
Pokémon.
Post Malone.

It’s the concert you never saw coming, Trainers. 

Don’t miss your chance to be front row for the Virtual Experience on Pokémon Day!

http://bit.ly/3rMYCBZ

Official site: https://www.pokemon.com
Shop: http://www.pokemoncenter.com​
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Pokemon​ 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Pokemon​ 
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/pokemon
